message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $13,000. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your confidence in your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm firm on $12,000. It's a fair price given the value of the product. Let's see if we can find some common ground.

I understand you're firm on $12,000, but I'm still a bit short on my budget. Can you meet me in the middle at $11,500? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.
